about_the_game:
The war between A.I. and humanity ended after thousands of years. The cost was the end of organic life as we know it. As humanity's last chance of survival, it has enlisted Marcus, a man with a robotic body but a humane soul. In the new world order controlled by artificial intelligence, Marcus must embark on a journey to find the last organic matter. Discover what this journey will bring to Marcus. Everything may not be as it seems.

A World that Builds Its Narration with Locations
We want you to feel what Marcus feels. That's why we offer you a new narration experience by utilizing the storytelling power of spaces. We designed this game to best convey the feelings of alienation, loneliness, tension, insecurity, and unease that you feel in the Neo Testament world.


Cautious With Immersive Combat Experience

In the world of Neo Testament, you need to avoid detection, especially at the beginning of the game. To avoid detection based on being seen and heard, you must progress using stealth mechanics. While mastering your abilities, players will become more experienced in the game progress.


Marcus Gets Stronger as you Progress

You are now a team with Marcus. The " Gear " system will reward players for pulling off tricky moves like perfect dodges, parries, and stealth kills. As Marcus' gear increases, so will some of his key stats like movement speed, attack speed, and damage. This way, the excitement will always accelerate, and your game enjoyment will increase.

What Makes Neo Testament's Gameplay Unique?

To make sure the gameplay and story support each other, we vary the intensity of stealth and combat throughout the game to parallel Marcus' trust in the world.

In the beginning, Marcus feels threatened and uneasy. The player is, therefore, encouraged to be stealthy. As the story progresses, the character and the player get used to the world and NPCs. Thus, the intensity of the conflict increases. This integration between stealth and conflict creates a much more immersive experience for players

short_description: After our battle with AI, life as we knew it ended thousands of years ago. 5000 years have passed. I awoke from my sleep. My robotic body and "soul," I, "Marcus," set out to find the last organic matter for the future of humanity in a world controlled by AI. Follow my quest for salvation.
